event_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the event in ISO 8601 format.

pickup_latitude.description: Latitude of the ride pickup location.

pickup_longitude.description: Longitude of the ride pickup location.

dropoff_latitude.description: Latitude of the ride dropoff location.

dropoff_longitude.description: Longitude of the ride dropoff location.

hour_of_day.description: Hour of the day (0-23) when the event occurred.

is_weekend.description: Binary indicator for weekend (1 if weekend, 0 otherwise).

is_holiday.description: Binary indicator for a public holiday (1 if holiday, 0 otherwise).

peak_hour_indicator.description: Binary indicator for peak hours (1 if peak, 0 otherwise).

demand_at_pickup.description: Simulated demand intensity at the pickup location and time.

grid_id_latitude.description: Latitude component of the geohash grid identifier.

grid_id_longitude.description: Longitude component of the geohash grid identifier.

poi_density.description: Density of points of interest in the area.

traffic_density_past_hour.description: Traffic density in the area over the past hour.

weather_condition_code.description: Weather condition code (e.g., 800 for clear sky).

demand_last_15min.description: Demand in the same area 15 minutes ago.

demand_last_30min.description: Demand in the same area 30 minutes ago.

demand_last_hour.description: Demand in the same area 1 hour ago.

demand_same_hour_last_day.description: Demand in the same area at the same hour yesterday.

future_demand_next_15min.description: Predicted demand for the next 15 minutes (target variable).
